title: Rakan and cait traps
body: Alright, so i played rakan into cait jsut then, and his w just stops if he gets hit by a caiut trap, as does his e, it doesnt stop when he finishs the movement, it jsut stops the ability ntirely, is this intentional? seeing as every other champ's dash isnt affected by traps until the end of the animation?

replies.body:
I'm not sure whether this is intentional or not, but you may want to drop a report in the Report a Bug sub-boards just in case! 

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report
ive never seen a yellow tag, ive seen green puple and blue, but what is yellow

Yasuo and Kalista's dashes are stopped by Hard cc mid-dash.
But I suspect that is only because they technically have unlimited dashes. _(which is kinda a little OP so it's fair enough)_

He doesn't have unlimited dashes, but he does have a heck of a lot, so maybe it is intentional and Riot have used it as a way to justify him having so much mobility?
